title: Hammonia by Karl Elchleb
content:
A tattoo artist asked me whether this typeface is available as a digital font:

[http://www.sanskritweb.net/temporary/hammonia1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804014234/http:/www.sanskritweb.net/temporary/hammonia1.jpg "http://www.sanskritweb.net/temporary/hammonia1.jpg") (low resolution)

[http://www.sanskritweb.net/temporary/hammonia2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804014234/http:/www.sanskritweb.net/temporary/hammonia2.jpg "http://www.sanskritweb.net/temporary/hammonia2.jpg") (high res color)

[http://www.sanskritweb.net/temporary/hammonia3.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804014234/http:/www.sanskritweb.net/temporary/hammonia3.jpg "http://www.sanskritweb.net/temporary/hammonia3.jpg") (high res b/w)

Any idea?
author: Uli

comments.content: This thread is being moved to the Type ID area.
